result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher J Swift was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal 4th+), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Cash bail to be applied to fine.  Balance to be paid at a rate of $100.00 per month commencing 9/1/22 and each month thereafter.  Penalty of civil judgment for non-payment.

Costs to be paid along with fine payments.

Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher J Swift

defendant.name: Swift, Christopher J
defendant.address: N56 W26184 Richmond Road, Sussex, WI 53089

records.addlTxt: Effective August 1, 2022, this case is assigned to Branch 7 Judicial Vacancy, pursuant to 22-SO-04(67).

03:35 PM Defendant Christopher J Swift in court.  Molly M Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

The Court conducts a colloquy with the Defendant as it relates to his waiver of right to an attorney.
The Defendant wishes to waive his right to an attorney.
The Court finds that the Defendant is freely, knowingly, and voluntarily waiving his right to an attorney.

The Court conducts a plea colloquy with the Defendant.
The Defendant pleads guilty to Counts 1 and 2.
The Court finds the Defendant guilty of Counts 1 and 2.
Cases 22CT2 and 22CT798 dismissed and read into 22CM1084.

The State gives its sentencing recommendation.
The Defense gives its sentencing recommendation.
The Defendant presents a statement.

Court orders the following:

COUNT 1:

Fine:  $379.00; 
DNA Sample and Surcharge:  $200.00;
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

COUNT 2:

Fine:  $505.00;
DNA Sample and Surcharge:  $200.00;
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

Apply the cash bail from case 22CT2 to this case.
Remaining Fine/Forfeiture/Costs/Surcharges:  Defendant to pay $100.00 per month commencing September 1, 2022 and each month thereafter until satisfied.  
Civil judgment to be entered as penalty for non payment.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

03:29 PM Defendant Christopher J Swift in court.  Molly M Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court notes this matter has not yet had an initial appearance and proceeds with an initial appearance prior to the plea and sentencing.  Service admitted/advised of charges and potential penalties.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.
Initial appearance on July 29, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

09:58 AM Defendant Christopher J Swift not in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The Court notes the defendant currently has a pretrial date set for this Friday on his other cases and will adjourn for an initial appearance.  Court ordered a warrant stayed until next court date.  Initial appearance scheduled for July 29, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
